To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private HighWaveCandle _highwavecandle;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_highwavecandle = HighWaveCandle(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_highwavecandle.IsReady)
{
    var current = _highwavecandle.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.highwavecandle = self.HighWaveCandle(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.highwavecandle.IsReady:
    current = self.highwavecandle.Current.Value
